pullrequest.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

content.raw:
It's probably easier to express the laser with respect to `base_link`, and then, continue from that. Something like:

```
Base Link
↑
Laser (x, y, z, r, p, y)
↑
Side_arm (-side_arm_length, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
↑
Post (0, 0, -(z - platform_z), 0, 0, 0)
```

Keep in mind that I’m assuming certain origins that might be wrong, don’t take it literally.
